about_the_game:
This Pack includes:

  • Al-Khalid-I (Rank 7 China);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

An advanced variant of the Chinese-Pakistani MBT-2000, featuring modern electronics and additional ERA blocks on the turret sides.

It's armed with an autoloaded 125 mm cannon equipped with powerful APFSDS and HE rounds, aided by a laser rangefinder and high-quality thermals. A 1200 hp engine helps the Al-Khalid reach 70 km/h, letting you push through the map and reach strong positions with ease. It also offers a fast reverse gear, allowing you to back out of trouble in no time. The front and sides of the turret along with the upper plate are protected by FY-2 ERA, offering extra protection against kinetic and chemical rounds, making it a tough nut to crack at longer ranges!

As a fast and versatile MBT, the Al-Khalid-I boasts impressive assets across the board, excelling in both offense and defense.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This Pack includes:

  • Al-Khalid-I (Rank 7 China);

  • Premium account for 20 days;

  • 2500 Golden Eagles.

An advanced variant of the Chinese-Pakistani MBT-2000, featuring modern electronics and additional ERA blocks on the turret sides.

It's armed with an autoloaded 125 mm cannon equipped with powerful APFSDS and HE rounds, aided by a laser rangefinder and high-quality thermals. A 1200 hp engine helps the Al-Khalid reach 70 km/h, letting you push through the map and reach strong positions with ease. It also offers a fast reverse gear, allowing you to back out of trouble in no time. The front and sides of the turret along with the upper plate are protected by FY-2 ERA, offering extra protection against kinetic and chemical rounds, making it a tough nut to crack at longer ranges!

As a fast and versatile MBT, the Al-Khalid-I boasts impressive assets across the board, excelling in both offense and defense.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
